body.header: Questions 11-15. Listen to the recording, which will play automatically, and follow the instructions. Click the correct letters A-C.

section.ol: 11How should the radio be wound?a.Pic Ab.Pic Bc.Pic C12How long will the radio play when completely wound?a.16 minutesb.50 minutesc.60 minutes13For AM reception the antenna should …a.not be extended.b.be semi-extended.c.be fully extended.14The function of the solar panel is to …a.play the radio.b.charge the battery.c.both play the radio and charge the battery.15How long will the radio play with a fully charged battery?a.16 hoursb.20 hoursc.30 hours

section.p: You should see from the questions and alternative answers that you will hear more facts about the radio. Question 11Make sure you know which direction each of the arrows is pointing. Clockwise or anticlockwise? Left or right? Question 12Is there an answer you can eliminate here? Do you think it would last only 16 minutes? Look at the choices here. Why have you been given a choice of 16 or 60? Is it because they sound the same and are sometimes confused? Question 13Note the question asks about AM reception. Question 14Look at the possible answers here. C is a combination of A and B. Don't just go for the first one you hear. There may be more to come. Question 15This one is difficult to guess but maybe the 16 was used on question 2 as it comes up here.
